iep_goals: Improve phonemic awareness by identifying beginning, middle, and ending sounds in CVC words with 80% accuracy
Read 50 sight words with automaticity in 4 out of 5 trials
accommodations: Small group instruction for language arts
learning_styles: benefits from visual supports and picture cues
responds well to repetition and practice

interviews.parent: Parent reports Sofia enjoys listening to stories but gets frustrated when trying to read independently.
interviews.teacher: Sofia is eager to learn but needs constant support with decoding unfamiliar words.

observations.psychologist: Average cognitive abilities with significant delays in phonological processing skills.
